# 35985504

A subset of components

An ordered list of components

A set of associations

between components

A set of components annotated with additional information

A set of maps or links

between SNOMED CT and other

code systems

A set of sets of components

<figure><img src="data:image/png;base64," alt=""><figcaption></figcaption></figure>

<figure><img src="data:image/png;base64," alt=""><figcaption></figcaption></figure>

\- Specify a group of concepts, used for analytics

\- Specify descriptions used for data entry

\- Specify the order of data entry items

\- Specify the order of search results

\- Specify alternative hierarchies for navigation

\- Associate inactive components with their replacements

\- Associate components of different types to support consistent and effective documentation

* Link components to web-resources

\- Link components to a textual advice for usage

\- Link concepts to a statistical classification to enable statistical analysis

\- Link concepts to legacy data, to support migration

\- Specify a set of reference sets used within a specific organisational unit

\- Specify a set of intensionally defined subsets used as value sets

\- [Simple reference sets](https://github.com/IHTSDO/snomedct-refset-guide/blob/main/x/y5HZAQ/README.md)

\- [Ordered reference sets](https://github.com/IHTSDO/snomedct-refset-guide/blob/main/x/vJHZAQ/README.md)

\- [Association reference set](https://github.com/IHTSDO/snomedct-refset-guide/blob/main/x/vZHZAQ/README.md)

\- [Annotation reference set](https://github.com/IHTSDO/snomedct-refset-guide/blob/main/x/v5HZAQ/README.md)

\- Simple map reference set

\- Complex and Extended map reference set

\- [Simple reference set](https://github.com/IHTSDO/snomedct-refset-guide/blob/main/x/y5HZAQ/README.md)

\- [Query Specification reference set](https://github.com/IHTSDO/snomedct-refset-guide/blob/main/x/zJHZAQ/README.md)
